ProductInfo.Features:
With more than 10 years of experience manufacturing Android Phones, ThL has managed to establish a broad customer base in both Europe and America.
As one of ThL's flagship phones, the "ThL W8+" features a high-end 5 Inch full high definition screen with a resolution of 1920x1080p and a higher PPI (440PPI) than most top brands, therefore watching videos and films will be a delight as the quality is amazing.
Now running the latest Android 4.2 as the operating system, you will have access to over 700,000 apps thanks to Google Play that lets you download the latest games and software applications to allow full customization.
There is a 13 megapixel rear camera as well as a 5 megapixel front camera, therefore taking pictures or recording videos will look crystal clear.
With 3G tethering, Bluetooth, GPS and WiFi N connection, you will have plenty of diversity when using the "ThL W8+".
ProductInfo.Name: ThL W8 Beyond 5 Inch 1.2GHz Quad Core Android 4.2 Phone 1920x1080p FHD IPS GPS Wifi Black + Card Reader
